Description of incident: A flash drive containing the personal              information of more than 103,000 former adult education students in              Virginia was misplaced. The information included names, Social Security              numbers and employment and demographic information. The flash drive              contained information on all students who finished an adult education              course in Virginia from April 2007 through June 2009 or who passed              a high school equivalency test between January 2001 and June 2009.
